scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec node --loader ts-node/esm src/index.ts
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const deleteFiles = (dir, exts) => { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.readdirSync(dir, {recursive: true, withFileTypes: true}).forEach(f => { if (f.isFile() && exts.some(ext => f.name.endsWith(ext))) fs.unlinkSync(path.join(f.path || f.parentPath, f.name)); }); }; deleteFiles('src', ['.js', '.d.ts', '.js.map', '.d.ts.map']); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true}); console.log('âœ… Cleaned compiled files');"
